text: The presence of loose or peeling paint in residential premises in violation of the housing code regulations codified in Title 14 of the District of Columbia Municipal Regulations which constitutes a lead-based paint hazard under this chapter, shall be enforced by the Mayor according to the provisions of this chapter.
